thread.title: Oh, NOW Democrats are worried about science being politicized?
thread.title_full: Oh, NOW Democrats are worried about science being politicized?

author: Sarah D.
title: Oh, NOW Democrats are worried about science being politicized?
text:
Trump’s new EPA policy is raising a few eyebrows: WASHINGTON (AP) — Trump administration mandating EPA scientific studies, data undergo review by political staff before public release 
— Josh Lederman (@joshledermanAP) January 25, 2017 
The Huffington Post’s Sam Stein, for one, isn’t too pleased about it. After all, it can be downright dangerous to let science get politicized: science isn't science when it's pushed through a political filter https://t.co/BVnFwSnuCF 
— Sam Stein (@samsteinhp) January 25, 2017 
Is that so? Could’ve fooled us. Guess it depends on who controls the filter, huh? Assume this is directed at Cuomo over fracking, or pro-unfettered abortion groups. https://t.co/UyvCsB3G8l 
— Seth Mandel (@SethAMandel) January 25, 2017 @samsteinhp your assuming EPA has been non-political which is far from true
